p: T test is used for comparison between two groups of data, and one-way ANOVA is applied to compare multiple groups. Survival analysis was performed using Kaplanâ€“Meier curve with P value calculated using the log-rank test. The correlation of mRNA expression was analyzed by Pearson test. Chi-square test was used to test the association of m 5C regulator expression with clinicopathological parameters. P < 0.05 was considered statistically significant.
